title: Sigma-66 "Sixteen Tons"

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have the abilities and attributes of a random non-Head role from an existing evil faction (except SCPs), that the host does not deem as 'overly anomalous' (that the Foundation would want to contain). If existing factions do not have roles fitting this criteria, any REF may be used for this.
- If you are the only surviving Foundation member, you win solo. You also can win with Neutral Killing roles.

desc:
Post 4796
*Mobile Task Force Sigma-66 is formed of captured members from other GoI. Despite the lack of loyalty the Foundation expects from the assembled team, they find the members' expertise of value.*
